name: lmbld
short_description:
LM BLD is a cross platform build system that can be used to build, install and manage programs and libraries.

This project includes packages for Open Source libraries and programs of interest.  At present the packages are for Windows, but the build system is cross-platform and other platforms such as Linux, FreeBSD, DOS can be supported.

For now, this project will host just the Open Source libraries and programs built by the LM BLD system and the build scripts generated as output by the system.  The build utilities are still in testing and will be added at a later date.
summary: Cross platform build system and distribution files
